story.title: The Beginning
story.detail: In the beginning was the great northern campaign. It all started when 3 dwarves walked into a bar...

story.title: You climb to the snow caps...
story.detail: The glare from the sun hitting the snow looks like a thousand shining swords glinting from a fresh polish.

story.title: Three blind orcs
story.detail: Suddenly you notice three of the glinting swords are coming at you. Roll initiative.

npcs.name: Orc Footman
npcs.desc: He's got feet and a sword

npcs.name: Orc Archer
npcs.desc: He's got feet and a bow

npcs.name: Orc Shaman
npcs.desc: Don't worry about his feet! He's got mojo.

story.title: Two great orcs
story.detail: The stumbling of two large creatures through the snow is hard to miss; but you managed to anyway.

npcs.name: Orc Axeman
npcs.desc: He's got feet and a sword

story.title: A long tumble
story.detail: As you slide down the slippery slope of snowy slush, you suddenly find your self falling straight into a cavern. The drop is no more than 15 feet, but it is jarring.

story.title: It's unkown
story.detail: I have no idea what this campaign is about...
